channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Jersey Governor’s Special Election Trick Is ‘Blatant Political Corruption’
item.description: Gov. Phil Murphy's hasty deadline for 11th Congressional District candidates to file is the latest election rig job from win-at-all-cost Dems.
